title: Class B position report AIS
description: A position report message for the AIS for a class b ship.

ais_message_type.description: The message type of the given AIS measurement

position.description: The position of the AIS entity

position_accuracy.description: The accuracy of the given AIS position. LOW is > 10 meters, HIGH is <= 10 meters

date.description: The date and time when the AIS message was created.

display_flag.description: Flag to indicate if display is integrated for messages 12 and 14

dsc_flag.description: Indicates whether ship is equipped with DSC function

band_flag.description: Capable of operating over the upper 525 kHz band of the marine band or the whole marine band

message_flag.description: Indicates if frequencycan be managed via message 22

assigned_mode_flag.description: State of station if it is operating in autonomous or assigned mode

raim_flag.description: Receiver autonomous integrity monitoring (RAIM) flag of electronic position fixing device
